hero-title: Uburyo bwihuse bwo kubona akazi n'abakozi bizewe mu Rwanda
hero-description: Akazi-Link ihuza ibigo n’abakozi bizewe mu Rwanda hose. Ohereza akazi mu minota mike, usabe akazi ukanze rimwe.
how-it-works-description: Intambwe eshatu zoroshye zo kugufasha kubona akazi kawe gikurikira
step-1-description: Reba amahirwe menshi mu byiciro bitandukanye no mu bice bitandukanye by’u Rwanda.
step-2-description: Hanga konti yawe rimwe, maze usabe imyanya myinshi ukoresheje gukanda gake.
step-3-description: Hura n’abakoresha bahita, utangire urugendo rwawe rushya rw’umwuga.
companyuse-title: Fasha Ikigo cyawe mu Gukoresha Abakozi hamwe na
companyuse-subtitle: Tanga akazi, reba abiyandikishije, kandi uhuze n’abahanga mu kazi vuba kurusha mbere. Uburyo bwacu bworoshye bugufasha kwibanda ku kubona umuntu uboneye itsinda ryawe.
companyuse-point1: - Tangaza imyanya ifunguye mu minota mike
companyuse-point3: - Kurikirana abakandida bose mu rubuga rumwe rworoshye
footer-company-desc: Guhuza impano n’amahirwe. Shaka akazi wifuza cyangwa umukandida mwiza.
